phrases: We were not spirited away on the wind
katamichi bun no yuuki de bokura
We knew we could never return, and found the courage
kokoro ga koko ni atta hazu no kuudou
There is an emptiness where my heart used to be
kimi wo mirai wo sukueta darou ka
I could have saved you, and our future...
taisetsu na hito wo mamoru sube ga tatta hitotsu shika motanai
I only know of one way to keep the people I love
And you left me and disappeared into the sky
anata ijou no hito ni deaenai
I will never find anyone like you again
A long flare reaches out against the moon
The story ends before it could even begin
I will call up the melody locked away
And sing it until I destroy myself
That is how much I love you
Our souls are born over and over.
They experience grief over and over.
And that grief goes to the arms of God in Heaven.
That is the beautiful law of the world.
Unfortunately, his soul has left the realm of law for something higher.
For we do not have the last son's body.
I say to you that Altair must not die
without seeing even a glimpse of its future.
The last son has shown us the way.
He has shown us that we live in a time of miracles!
And Ianthe's power is becoming unstable.
You cannot keep them in the dark forever.
What do you think you are doing?
Just spreading the great news to the flock.
He gave much to the world of Altair.
His life was a fair price to pay.
We were able to deal a great blow to the Rare Iguras' nest.
We obtained a great deal of direct data on the true Eve candidates.
And the reborn Wings of the Sun finally revealed itself.
Jin's soul would be filled with joy if it knew what it brought us.
Perhaps it will be reborn in the first of Altair's new generation.
So that is what you really wanted.
Jin, what I... what Altair has done can never be forgiven.
We will be taking them to the graveyard in Neo-Stanley.
She will not come out of her room.
Is she going to shut herself in forever?
I know how she feels, though.
If I lost someone I loved, I would...
I do not like him at all...
I want to leave her alone for now.
This school's duty is to foster Union, a positive bond that connects people together.
None can be allowed to drown selfishly alone in their own sorrow.
How can you call that selfish?
Have you forgotten Yunoha's Element power?
In the wake of Jin Muso's death, her power may go out of control...
I thought you might need something to drink.
You do not have to if you do not want to.
I will just leave it here.
But what can I possibly say?
He asked me to go with him.
If only I would gone, Jin would not...
Oh no... it is getting even fainter now...
She is really going to disappear.
I do not want to... to say goodbye to Jin!
I do not want to say goodbye to you, or to Jin either!
You are a precious friend to me.
Mother, you are on Jin's world?
At last the students are learning how grateful they should be to the place we put our lives on the line for,
and the classmates we have lost.
We are talking about peoples' lives -
We have decided to quit school and go back home.
Is that how much you care about your duty?
We Elements have been chosen to fight for this planet!
How could you forget what an honor that -
We have been through so much training and...
Someone has to stick around or we are all doomed.
We will all be sucked into that big hole in the sky.
I am not going to fall into someone else's hole.
I will not let it happen.
Jin Muso came from another planet called Altair.
From the data Jin left us, we have ascertained Altair's intentions.
The war with Altair will only become more intense.
As it goes on, more may find themselves buried beneath this earth.
In order to prepare you to stand up to the challenge of this war,
I would not want to be buried in any hole!
And a grave, of all holes!
How can you say such things when we are all still in pain?!
Each of you is bound by your lives.
As you sleep with the dead, the force of your lives will expand.
These thoughts form the links of a chain that shackles each of your souls.
Here, just once, you must experience death.
You will journey to the very edge of life, then return.
What will you discover in your temporary death?
You must find out for yourselves!
I am already on my way there myself.
If my death is soon to come, I may as well rehearse.
I want to be with him.
I want to be with Jin, just for a little while.
I will have to fill it myself.
Filling a hole I worked so hard on feels like dying anyway.
For you, that is all right.
Your eye looks like it can see through everything.
The sound of the bugs crawling through the earth.
The creatures that squirm through the dirt.
I can feel the worms creeping at me, trying to get me...
I am going to turn into dust and break apart...
Rot away... and return to the earth...
Where I will be one with Jin again...
I am going to go back to the earth...
At this rate, I will never see the surface again...
Do not be afraid of this hole.
The little Wingless are struggling in the darkness.
Kagura, you want to join them, do not you?
To take the same journey to Hades?
No matter how hard it gets, I cannot leave!
If I remember that, I will not be scared.
Not even through my Prophecy of Despair.
If Mikono is the reincarnation of Sylvie...
then she is not going to choose you, Amata.
She left me behind, and I wanted to die.
I think I want to die.
If Jin's not in this world anymore...
then I do not want to be in it!
Their thoughts are going out of control.
If I am born again, I will be abandoned again.
I do not want to be abandoned by anyone ever again.
Amata is going to be abandoned...
I do not want to live anymore.
I want to stay here with Jin.
I do not want to be born again.
Mikono Suzushiro, this is your power.
The ending of life is not the only death humans experience.
Just like how we she would hair and lose teeth,
the cells in our body, heart, and soul are always dying.
But if we are bound to our old, dead selves, if we keep them with us,
we are divided and cut off from the universe.
Mikono Suzushiro, your power is to connect those who are so divided once more.
To reach out to those who are attached to their old selves
and transform their dead into nourishment.
Like the tendrils of a mushroom,
You connect all the fragmented souls together as they dangle between life and death.
All this time, these twelve thousand years, I have loved you.
Eight thousand years from the time that I met you, my love will be stronger than ever before.
I did not care about anyone else.
Yunoha, when I met you, for the first time I wanted to connect with someone.
And the rest of you too.
I realized that I am not alone.
Our lives can go beyond life and death...
We are being cradled by the dead!
I feel like I am a baby being held at my mom's breast again!
If I would never been born, I would not be here to experience this!
If I would never been born, I would not have met anyone here.
I would not have met Jin.
There is nothing scary outside of this hole!
There will be danger, all right.
But there will be the same warmth I feel in this hole!
That warmth will always come with pain and suffering.
There are sounds that must be played from the edge of death and rebirth!
I will be here, waiting for you!
All of you are going to be born again!
And I will be waiting for you!
As time flows on, we are all being born moment by moment and reborn moment by moment.
The instant that nothing becomes something...
And when a heart is there to experience the instant of now...
That is when thoughts are truly in Union.
Being reborn from the earth gave those kids quite a power up.
I would better step up my game!
Looks like my old taser is due for an upgrade!
Next time on Aquarion Evol: The Beasts of Love.
The character in the previous scene, (old), is part of .
(now) when stacked on top of (heart) make (thought).
The (thought) from the last scene is the first character in the phrase Fudo uses here: (nenshin gattai).
